title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki
content:

Denis - (07:48): [ANN] Starting 2.2.6 release  
lucaa joined #xwiki at 07:55  
kibahop joined #xwiki at 07:58  
mflorea joined #xwiki at 08:06  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (08:44): Committing a bunch of selenium2.0 tests and infrastructure.  
plunden1 joined #xwiki at 08:55  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (08:55): Denis: Are you ok with me sending a proposal to the dev list about a security advisory?  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (08:56): (I don't know how 2.2.6 is going...)  
plunden left #xwiki at 08:56  
plunden1 left at 08:56 (Remote host closed the connection  
plunden1 joined #xwiki at 08:56  
jvdrean joined #xwiki at 09:03  
anamarias joined #xwiki at 09:03  
Denis - (09:05): CalebJamesDeLisl: maybe it is better to wait 2.2.6 is out, I am a little bit late  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (09:06): When do you expect to finish? This is just a proposal (no details).  
Denis - (09:07): well, since this my first try, it is not easy to say, in a couple of hours ?  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (09:08): Want me to hold the proposal until tomorrow?  
Denis - (09:09): if you want, you can send it to me and I will forward as soon as I have finished...  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (09:10): I can do that. Still it will take time for the devs to look it over and decide how much info should be sent out then the real mail is sent.  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (09:12): Sent  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (09:13): Good luck on 2.2.6  
Denis - (09:13): got it, thanks  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (09:14): Feel free to adjust it or add to it.  
Denis - (09:14): ok  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (09:14): Bed time for me. Good night all.  
lucaa - (09:15): good night CalebJamesDeLisl  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (09:15): A final note, This is why I love Linux: [user@fc9p4 ui-tests]$ uptime  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (09:15):  03:23:35 up 30 days, 10:55, 10 users,  load average: 0.22, 0.29, 0.29  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (09:16): (that's my desktop)

anamarias - (15:18): hi  
anamarias - (15:18): I have a class that extends AbstractLogEnabler  
anamarias - (15:18): https://svn.xwiki.org/svnroot/xwiki/platform/core/trunk/xwiki-component/xwiki-component-api/src/main/java/org/xwiki/component/logging/AbstractLogEnabled.java  
anamarias - (15:18): and uses the logger, where should I look for the log messages?  
anamarias - (15:18): in Apache

jvdrean joined #xwiki at 15:37  
sdumitriu - (16:24): Hey Denis, how's the release process?  
sdumitriu - (16:24): Any problems so far?  
Denis - (16:25): yes, I had 2, my too poor internet line and "You need the Rosetta software to run windres. The Rosetta installer is in Optional Installs on your Mac OS X installation disc."  
Denis - (16:25): for the rest, it goes well  
Denis - (16:26): just a little bit disgusted by the last message after 1 hour and a half uploading….
